title: Beginners' Guide to Reselling Books on Amazon FBA
headline: Master the step-by-step process of buying great books for reselling on Amazon FBA with this free online course.
description: Whether you are thinking about selling used books or books you no longer read, Amazon is the best place to start your profitable online business. This free online course will introduce you to the benefits of selling books on Amazon and how to get free or cheap books using eFLIP and Zen Arbitrage for reselling at a higher price. In addition, learn how to sell books and choose the best fulfillment method to handle shipping securely.

courseDescription:
Do you want to know what types of books to sell on Amazon? This course will teach you how to become ‘ungated’ on Amazon and find which types and categories of books sell well on this platform. Learn to fulfill your orders using methods like Fulfillment By Amazon (FBA) and Fulfillment By Merchant (FBM). You will look at the features of eFLIP and how to access thousands of books on Amazon. Discover the profit potential of a book before purchasing it through the FBA calculator.

Additionally, you will learn the importance of staying organized and keeping track of inventory, sales and profits. Have a clear understanding of how the best repricing software works, such as RepriceIt and BQool. Discover the reasons why you should set minimum prices on the inventory and not buy international editions of books. Learn to read the Keepa chart to track price and sale rank history. Uncover why you should use Fulfill By Amazon and how to ship products into it.

Finally, gain insight into the characteristics of Zen Arbitrage and how it works. Find out the differences and similarities between eFLIP and Zen Arbitrage software. Learn how to return any Amazon purchase orders for free and avoid the high rate of canceling orders. Large bookstores and new sellers may find considerable success selling books online through Amazon. This course is suitable for anyone who would love a new source of income without owning a website. Why wait? Start learning today!

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.name: Module
modules.details: How to Sell Books on Amazon
modules.description: In this module, you will learn a step-by-step guide on where to buy free or cheap books for reselling and ways to get ungated on Amazon. Discover how to automate your pricing with BQool and the importance of staying organised and keeping track of inventory, sales and profits.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: This module will teach you how to collect sales taxes while avoiding Amazon purchase cancellations. Learn how to read the Keepa chart to track price history and the benefits of shipping products into Amazon FBA.
topics: Product Purchases and Reselling Software - Learning Outcomes

  • Lesson Summary

  • Amazon may sell popular book formats like hardcovers, paperbacks, and ebooks.
  • Benefits of Selling Books on Amazon:
    • Easy to fulfil by Fulfillment By Amazon and Fulfillment By Amazon.
    • Sell faster and for more during textbook seasons.
    • Cheap fees in Fulfillment By Merchant.
    • Increase in sales when you get ungated on Amazon.
    • Easy to make money because of the high prices and low cost of fulfilling orders.
  • Ways to Get Ungated on Amazon:
    • Maximum approval 
    • Invoice from legitimate wholesaler or manufacturer

  • Lesson Summary

  • Repricing software allows sellers to lower or raise their inventory prices instantly and automatically based on the set parameters.
  • Types of Repricing Software:
    • RepriceIt
    • BQool
  • Types of Book Arbitrage Software:
    • eFlip
    • Zen Arbitrage
  • The Inventory Performance Index (IPI) is a score Amazon assesses to determine how well sellers manage their inventory.
